name: One Punch-Man
describe: In this new action-comedy, everything about a young man named Saitama screams AVERAGE, from his lifeless expression, to his bald head, to his unimpressive physique.
author: Yusuke Murata

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
describe: Although Yuji Itadori looks like your average teenager, his immense physical strength is something to behold! Every sports club wants him to join
author: Gege Akutami

name: One Piece
describe: As a child, Monkey D. Luffy was inspired to become a pirate by listening to the tales of the buccaneer Red-Haired Shanks. But his life changed when Luffy accidentally ate the Gum-Gum Devil Fruit and gained the power to stretch like rubber
author: Eiichirou Oda

name: Chainsaw Man
describe: The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter.
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
describe: As players of Monster Hunter and Dungeons & Dragons know, the slime is not exactly the king of the fantasy monsters.
author: Taiki Kawakami

name: Oshi no Ko
describe: Gorou is a gynecologist and idol fan who’s in shock after his favorite star, Ai, announces an impromptu hiatus. Little does Gorou realize that he’s about to forge a bond with her that defies all common sense! Lies are an idol’s weapon!
author: Aka Akasaka

name: Dandadan
describe: Ghosts, monsters, aliens, teen romance, battles...and the kitchen sink! This series has it all! Takakura, an occult maniac who doesn't believe in ghosts, and Ayase, a girl who doesn't believe in aliens, try to overcome their differences when they encounter the paranormal! This manga is out of this world!
author: Yukinobu Tatsu

name: Mob Psycho 100
describe: Do you or someone you know need an exorcist who works cheap? Reigen's your guy!
author: ONE

name: Berserk
describe: His name is Guts, the Black Swordsman, a feared warrior spoken of only in whispers. Bearer of a gigantic sword, an iron hand, and the scars of countless battles and tortures
author: Kentarou Miura

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 7: Steel Ball Run
describe: Originally presented as an unrelated story, this series was later officially declared a part of the JoJo storyline. The series stars Gyro
author: Hirohiko Araki

name: Vagabond
describe: At seventeen years of age, Miyamoto Musashi--still known by his childhood name, Shinmen Takezo--was a wild young brute just setting out along the way of the sword.
author: Takehiko Inoue

name: MONSTER
describe: Everyone faces uncertainty at some point in their lives. Even a brilliant surgeon like Kenzo Tenma is no exception.
author: Naoki Urasawa

name: Vinland Saga
describe: As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid.
author: Makoto Yukimura

name: SLAM DUNK
describe: Hanamichi Sakuragi's got no game with girls--none at all! It doesn't help that he's known for throwing down at a moment's notice and always coming out on top.
author: Makoto Yukimura

name: Houseki no Kuni
describe: In a world inhabited by crystalline lifeforms called The Lustrous, every unique gem must fight for their way of life against the threat of lunarians who would turn them into decorations.
author: Haruko Ichikawa

name: Real
describe: A motorcycle accident, bone cancer, a speeding truck crashing into a boy on a stolen bicycle--tragic life-changing events turn the worlds of three young men upside down.
author: Takehiko Inoue

name: Kingdom
describe: Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world.
author: Yasuhisa Hara

name: Fullmetal Alchemist
describe: Alchemy tore the Elric brothers’ bodies apart. Can their bond make them whole again?In this world, alchemists are those who study and perform the art of alchemical transmutation—the science of manipulating and transforming matter.
author: Hiromu Arakawa

name: Bakemonogatari
author: One day, high-school student Koyomi Araragi catches a girl named Hitagi Senjougahara when she trips. But—much to his surprise—she doesn’t weigh anything. At all. She says an encounter with a so-called “crab” took away all her weight …

name: Dorohedoro
describe: In a city so dismal it's known only as the Hole, a clan of Sorcerers have been plucking people off the streets to use as guinea pigs for atrocious experiments in the black arts. In a dark alley, Nikaido found Caiman, a man with a reptile head and a bad case of amnesia.
author: Q Hayashida

name: Hell’s Paradise : Jigokuraku
describe: Gabimaru the Hollow is one of the most vicious assassins ever to come out of the ninja village of Iwagakure.
author: Yuuji Kaku

name: BEASTARS
describe: One night at Cherryton Academy, an herbivore student is brutally murdered. Among the members of the Drama Club, the herbivores’ suspicions naturally turn to their carnivore classmates
author: Paru Itagaki

name: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought
describe: Eiji the college-age virgin dreams of someday having a girlfriend...until he wakes up one day with his girlfriend in his bed with him! Not only that, his buddy tells him he got in a fight.
author: Hajime Inoryuu

name: Ansatsu Kyoushitsu
describe: Meet the would-be assassins of class 3-E: Sugino, who let his grades slip and got kicked off the baseball team. Karma, who’s doing well in his classes but keeps getting suspended for fighting.
author: Yuusei Matsui

name: The Saga of Tanya the Evil
describe: What would an ultra-rational Japanese salaryman do if he was reborn as a girl in a world where magic was real?
author: Carlo Zen

name: Black Butler
describe: In Victorian era Europe, a young boy loses everything he once held near and dear to a vicious plot. In his moment of death, he strikes a deal with a demon: his soul, in exchange for revenge.
author: Mochi

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
describe: The setting is Taisho era Japan. Tanjirou is a kindhearted young boy who lived peacefully with his family as a coal seller. Their normal life changes completely when his family is slaughtered by demons.
author: Koyoharu Gotouge

name: CLAYMORE
describe: A village is gripped by fear and paranoia when a Yoma claims six lives. The Claymore who is sent to slay the creature isn't what the villagers expect at all. In fact, she seems more monster than human.
author: Norihiro Yagi

name: Bleach
describe: Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society.
author: Tite Kubo

name: BLAME!
describe: Killy is a man of few words. He wanders, seemingly endlessly, through a lonely, gargantuan labyrinth of concrete and steel, fighting off cyborgs and other futuristic nightmares, searching only for something called Net Terminal Genes.
author: Tsutomu Nihei

name: Naruto
describe: Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. A man known as the 4th Hokage sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers.
author: Masashi Kishimoto

name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon
describe: Some adventurers delve into the sprawling labyrinths beneath the city of Orario to find fame and fortune. Others come to test their skills against the legions of monsters lurking in the darkness below.
author: Kunieda

name: Itou Junji Jisen Kessakushuu
describe: Including nine of Junji Ito's best short stories, as selected by the author himself and presented with accompanying notes and commentary. It also includes one all new, previously unpublished story.
author: Junji Itou

name: Soul Eater
describe: In a world where technicians wield the select humans who can turn into weapons, Shinigami-sama created a school to teach young technicians and their shape shifting partners what it means to be a just death god
author: Atsushi Ookubo

name: The Promised Neverland
describe: Emma, Norman and Ray are the brightest kids at the Grace Field House orphanage. And under the care of the woman they refer to as “Mom,” all the kids have enjoyed a comfortable life.
author: Posuka Demizu

name: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
describe: Kicked out by his family and wandering the streets, an unemployed 34-year-old shut-in thinks he’s hit rock-bottom—just as he’s hit and killed by a speeding truck!
author: Yuka Fujikawa

name: Uzumaki
describe: Kurozu-cho, a small fogbound town on the coast of Japan, is cursed. According to Shuichi Saito, the withdrawn boyfriend of teenager Kirie Goshima, their town is haunted not by a person or being but by a pattern: uzumaki, the spiral, the hypnotic secret shape of the world.
author: Junji Itou

name: Lookism
describe: Daniel is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Daniel aims to achieve everything he couldn't before. How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
author: Tae-Jun Park

name: My Hero Academia
describe: Middle school student Izuku Midoriya wants to be a hero more than anything, but he hasn’t got an ounce of power in him. With no chance of ever getting into the prestigious U.A.
author: Kouhei Horikoshi

name: Komi-san wa, Komyushou desu.
describe: Timid Tadano is a total wallflower, and that’s just the way he likes it. But all that changes when he finds himself alone in a classroom on the first day of high school with the legendary Komi.
author: Tomohito Oda

name: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi wo Suru
describe: Traumatized by a childhood incident with a friend who took exception to his love of traditional dolls, doll-artisan hopeful Gojou Wakana passes his days as a loner, finding solace in the home ec room at his high school.
author: Shinichi Fukuda

name: Me and the Devil Blues: The Unreal Life of Robert Johnson
describe: Legend has it that if you take your guitar and stand at a crossroads at the witching hour, the devil will appear.
author: Akira Hiramoto

name: Fire Punch
describe: Orphaned siblings Agni and Luna, like the Ice Witch who cursed their world, are two of the “blessed,” humans who hold special abilities.
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto

name: No Longer Human
describe: Mine has been a life of much shame.I can’t even guess myself what it must be to live the life of a human being.
author: Junji Itou

name: Heavenly Delusion
describe: Within the safety of the walls, youths are raised in a nursery-style setting by robots. While life there may appear stale on the surface, the children are full of potential and curiosity.
author: Masakazu Ishiguro

name: Black Clover
describe: Young Asta was born with no magic ability in a world where magic is everything.
author: Yuuki Tabata

name: Fire Force
describe: Terror has paralyzed the clockwork metropolis of Tokyo! Possessed by demons, people have begun to burst into flame, leading to the establishment of a special firefighting team: the Fire Force, ready to roll on a moment's notice to fight spontaneous combustion anywhere it might break out.
author: Atsushi Ookubo

name: Tobaku Datenroku Kaiji
describe: Itou Kaiji, now free of debt but without a penny is leeching himself in Mr.Sakazaki's new house, despite all the flirtings (extreme torment for Kaiji) from Sakazaki's daughter, Mikoko.
author: Nobuyuki Fukumoto

name: Golden Kamuy
describe: In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi “Immortal” Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it.
author: Satoru Noda

name: Bungo Stray Dogs
describe: Having been kicked out of the orphanage, a despairing young man by the name of Atsushi Nakajima rescues a strange man from a suicide attempt--Osamu Dazai.
author: Kafka Asagiri

name: Mushishi
describe: Some live in the deep darkness behind your eyelids. Some eat silence. Some thoughtlessly kill. Some simply drive men mad. They are known as mushi—creatures that came into being shortly after life emerged from the primordial ooze.
author: Yuki Urushibara

name: SPY x FAMILY
describe: The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent his days on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. But one day, he receives a particularly difficult new order from command!
author: Tatsuya Endou

name: Attack on Titan
describe: In this post-apocalyptic sci-fi story, humanity has been devastated by the bizarre, giant humanoids known as the Titans. Little is known about where they came from or why they are bent on consuming mankind.
author: Hajime Isayama
